languages.text: "Мой сын. Защитник тех, чью кровь вы пьете, чьим непосильным трудом оплачена ваша сытая беззаботная жизнь на палубах флагмана".
"My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your content life on the upper decks of this ship."
languages.original_text: "Мой сын. Защитник тех, чью кровь вы пьете, чьим непосильным трудом оплачена ваша сытая беззаботная жизнь на палубах флагмана".

traits.locale_text: "My son. Protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your carefree life on the upper decks of the flagship."
"My son. Protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your carefree life on the upper decks of the flagship."
"My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your carefree life on the upper decks of the flagship."
"My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your carefree life on the upper decks of the flagship."
"My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your content life on the upper decks of this ship."
"My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your content life on the upper decks of this ship."

languages.text: "Mein Sohn, der Beschützer jener, von deren Blut Ihr Euch nährt, dessen harte Arbeit Euer bequemes Leben auf den oberen Decks dieses Schiffs bezahlt hat."
languages.original_text: "My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your content life on the upper decks of this ship."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Sohn, der Beschützer jener, von deren Blut Ihr Euch nährt, dessen harte Arbeit Euer bequemes Leben auf den oberen Decks dieses Schiffs bezahlt hat."

languages.text: «Mi hijo, el protector de aquellos de cuya sangre se alimenta usted, cuyo arduo trabajo le ha pagado una vida de privilegios en las cubiertas superiores de la nave».
languages.original_text: "My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your content life on the upper decks of this ship."

traits.locale_text: «Mi hijo, el protector de aquellos de cuya sangre se alimenta usted, cuyo arduo trabajo le ha pagado una vida de privilegios en las cubiertas superiores de la nave».

languages.text: 「我が息子、その血を糧とする者たちの守護者であり、その懸命な働きで、この船の上層デッキで満足のいく生活を送ることができた」
languages.original_text: "My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your content life on the upper decks of this ship."

traits.locale_text: 「我が息子、その血を糧とする者たちの守護者であり、その懸命な働きで、この船の上層デッキで満足のいく生活を送ることができた」

languages.text: “是我的儿子，他守护着那些你赖以为生的人们。都是那些人的辛勤劳作，才能让你在上层甲板过着奢靡的生活。”
languages.original_text: "My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your content life on the upper decks of this ship."

traits.locale_text: “是我的儿子，他守护着那些你赖以为生的人们。都是那些人的辛勤劳作，才能让你在上层甲板过着奢靡的生活。”

languages.text: « Mon fils, le protecteur des malheureux dont vous sucez le sang pour assurer votre survie, ceux dont le dur labeur finance votre train de pacha sur les ponts supérieurs de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your content life on the upper decks of this ship."

traits.locale_text: « Mon fils, le protecteur des malheureux dont vous sucez le sang pour assurer votre survie, ceux dont le dur labeur finance votre train de pacha sur les ponts supérieurs de ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Oğlum. Kanından beslendiklerinin, geminin üst güvertelerindeki rahat hayatı emekleriyle ödeyenlerin koruyucusu."
languages.original_text: "My son, the protector of those whose blood you feed upon, whose hard work has paid for your content life on the upper decks of this ship."
